text: I am a graduate from the University of Western Australia, majoring in Computer Science.
I've built various things, from websites to scripting solutions. I write in C, C#, Java, Scala, Python and Lua.
Check out my projects by scrolling down below or by using the navbar on the left.
I am also a photographer by hobby, feel free to check out my work in the sidebar below the home button!
You can find my contact details by clicking the ID icon on the navbar (bottom most).
